text: The men's 1500 metres event at the 2003 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Bydgoszcz, Poland, at Zawisza Stadion on 18 and 20 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Mounir Yemmouni ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Xavier Areny ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Lorenzo Perrone ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
